difficulty: Being able to see the titles while browsing a column and not having to scroll sideways made it easy. Scrolling sideways excessively to read columns made it very difficult.
format: Getting the right answer intuitivelty felt good. Not having to scroll sideways felt really good.
comments: Sometimes i had difficulty getting the chart to scroll back to the left. Also if i turned phone sideways the image was too big and i couldn't reduce it.
